sentences.en: ...the erection of temporary fencing to protect hedges.
sentences.cn: …为保护树篱的临时栅栏的搭建。

sentences.en: Erection of the new hospital so near the main road is a mistake.
sentences.cn: 在公路这么近建医院之举是个错误.

sentences.en: Erection of the pylon required a crane of 1000 ton capacity.
sentences.cn: 塔架安装需用起重量达1000吨的吊机.

sentences.en: Its lower end is anchored at the erection truss by a clamp.
sentences.cn: 其下端由一夹钳锚定在施工桁梁上.

sentences.en: She calls the new opera house " that hideous erection "
sentences.cn: 她把新歌剧院叫作 “ 那讨厌的庞然大物 ”

sentences.en: She calls the new opera house ` that hideous erection '.
sentences.cn: 她把新歌剧院称作‘那讨厌的庞然大物 ’.

sentences.en: Temporary catwalks were used in the stay erection.
sentences.cn: 安装拉索时设置了临时脚手.

sentences.en: The Code contains clauses on materials and workmanship for fabrication and erection.
sentences.cn: 代码包含在材料和手艺给制造和施工上的条款.

sentences.en: The construction company is fully in charge of the administration of all erection work.
sentences.cn: 建设公司完全负责全部安装工程的行政管理.

sentences.en: The erection of this framework took only a few minutes.
sentences.cn: 架设这个框架只需几分钟.

sentences.en: The sound of the hammer engaged upon the erection of new structures was everywhere heard.
sentences.cn: 到处可以听到建造新楼的铁锤敲击声.

sentences.en: The tilting of the gyro continues until the erection torque balances the torque producing the precession.
sentences.cn: 陀螺继续倾斜直至修正力矩与产生进动的力矩平衡.

sentences.en: These costs may be counterbalanced by the advantages of simplified fabrication, erection, and added aesthetics.
sentences.cn: 这些开销可由简化制造与安装及增添美观等优点来补偿.

sentences.en: We bid for the erection of a multistory building.
We bid for the erection of a multistory hotel.
sentences.cn: 我们投标建一座多层旅馆。

sentences.en: We shall tender for the erection of that building.
sentences.cn: 我们要为兴建那幢大楼而投标.

words.tran_cn: 竖立的；笔直的；因性刺激而勃起的
勃起的；[昆] 可使直立的

trans.tran_cn: 建造，竖立，建筑，充血的过程
trans.tran_en: if a man has an erection, his penis increases in size and becomes stiff and upright because he is sexually excited
